cue import -o - -f --list -l '"\(strings.ToLower(kind))" "\(name)"' --recursive ./import
cmp stdout expect-stdout
-- expect-stdout --
import json656e63 "encoding/json"

service: {
	booster: [{
		kind: "Service"
		name: "booster"
	}]
	"supplement\nfoo": [{
		kind: "Service"
		name: """
		supplement
		foo
		"""
		json: json656e63.Marshal(_cue_json)
		_cue_json = [1, 2]
	}]
}
deployment: booster: [{
	kind:     "Deployment"
	name:     "booster"
	replicas: 1
}]
-- import/services.cue --
service: [{
	kind: "Service"
	name: "booster"
}, {
	kind: "Service"
	name: """
		supplement
		foo
		"""
	json: "[1, 2]"
}]
deployment: [{
	kind:     "Deployment"
	name:     "booster"
	replicas: 1
}]
-- import/services.jsonl --
{
    "kind": "Service",
    "name": "booster"
}
{
    "kind": "Deployment",
    "name": "booster",
    "replicas": 1
}
{
    "kind": "Service",
    "name": "supplement\nfoo",
    "json": "[1, 2]"
}
-- cue.mod --
